thread.title: Alexis Sanchez throws ANOTHER huge tantrum during Chile’s defeat to Argentina as Arsenal future remains uncertain
thread.title_full: Alexis Sanchez throws ANOTHER huge tantrum during Chile’s defeat to Argentina as Arsenal future remains uncertain

author: rforrester
title: Alexis Sanchez throws ANOTHER huge tantrum during Chile’s defeat to Argentina as Arsenal future remains uncertain
text:
No Chil Alexis Sanchez throws ANOTHER huge tantrum during Chile’s defeat to Argentina as Arsenal future remains uncertain 
Gunners ace is enduring a miserable season for Arsenal which could be compounded by his country Pictured 24th March 2017, 11:36 am Updated: 24th March 2017, 11:38 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ALEXIS SANCHEZ let his frustrations boil over once again as Chile crashed to defeat against Argentina on Thursday. 
The Arsenal star is known for playing with his heart on his sleeve but it appeared as though he neared breaking point during the World Cup qualifier. Getty Images Alexis Sanchez couldn’t control his emotions as Chile crashed to defeat Getty Images 4 Alexis Sanchez has been struggling to hide his fury this season 
Chile were desperate for a win to keep their hopes of qualifying for the tournament in Russia alive but Lionel Messi’s penalty succumbed the South American side to their fifth defeat. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news , gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And Sanchez couldn’t contain his emotions at the full-time whistle as he almost tore his shirt off before covering his face to hide his fury. 
The 28-year-old’s anger has been building up for the majority of the season with his club also heading through a tough patch. 
Uncertainty surrounding Sanchez’s future could be taking its toll on the star. Getty Images The Chilean covered his face to hide his fury at the full-time whistle most read WARBURY V GILLS Warriors in action as Nick flies off to Florida - can they fire their way to victory? HART STOPPER Joe Hart to captain England vs Lithuania... but fears he could get Three Lions chop like Wayne Rooney Dier situation Eric Dier warns England fans they must behave against Lithuania after shameful actions in Germany sealing the deal Jose Mourinho pictured in Croatia as he bids to get £35million Ivan Perisic deal over the line brita 'n twisted Germany U21s 1 England U21s 0: Young Lions suffer same fate as Gareth Southgate's seniors but there's nothing unlucky about this one NORRIS MINOR Swindon's team is youngest in top 4 divisions and Luke Norris says lack of experience is costly rom the defensive Romelu Lukaku says decision not to sign Everton deal is 'already made'... and defends ambition comments 'Excitement may be contagious' Bastian Schweinsteiger looked delighted as he shows off wearing a Chicago Fire scarf NUTS FOR BRAZIL Paulinho leading Brazil revival in remarkable turnaround from his flop at Tottenham karren brady Gareth Southgate's England team comes mainly from two Premier League clubs... but no-one from Arsenal Reuters 4 And it hasn’t been an easy ride at club level this season as Alexis Sanchez becomes disillusioned with life 
He is currently holding off penning a new contract at the Gunners with manager Arsene Wenger’s future also up in the air. 
And with Sanchez’s time at the Emirates looking increasingly likely that it is coming to an end, Arsenal could swoop for Barcelona’s Arda Turan as his replacement. Want-away Arsenal man Alexis Sanchez appears to be smirking as Arsenal lose
